items.text:
You come across a massive pile of diced and sliced vegetables, roots,
and tubers. Occasionally, more slices fly through the air to land on
top of the pile.

“Back already?” a voice says from beyond the vegetable pile. “I told
you. There’s no silverfin curry to be had until the fish has marinated
for at least three hours!”

A head pokes out from behind the pile. “Oh, it’s you! I thought
you were Elder Thrush. She gets so impatient on silverfin curry day!
Calypsa sent you for the biscuits, eh? They’re just out of the oven. Let
me know when you’re ready to leave, and we’ll get you and those
biscuits to the good people of White Sky straight away.”
Travel away from Lone Tree Station while Hy Pimpot is in play to complete the mission.
